appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Create address markers in Map Maker with one click

loading.description: Message that shows while loading the popup

addressHelperDescription.description: Label describing the extenstion in the popup
addressHelperDescription.message: This will automatically add and save a new address for the given options.

addressValue.description: This is 'Address' in the language set, that map maker uses when you 'Add Place'

streetNumHint.message: Start adding addresses at this number

streetNameHint.message: This needs to be exactly as you would pick it when adding manually

townCityHint.message: Specify this if the Town / City doesn't get set automatically

autoIncLabel.description: Label for auto increment check box

autoIncHint.description: Hint for auto increment check box
autoIncHint.message: If you specify 'Auto Increment', once you place each address marker you can immediately place the next address number until you cancel

incByLabel.description: Label for increment by drop down

showHints.description: Label for show hints toggle menu item

noStreetNumError.description: Error when no street number is specified
noStreetNumError.message: You must specify a street number.

needWholeNumberError.description: Error when the street number is not a whole number and auto increment is checked
needWholeNumberError.message: Street number must be a whole number if auto incrementing.

noStreetNameError.description: Error when no street name is specified
noStreetNameError.message: You must specify a street name.

numWithLetter.description: Confirmation that the address will auto increment the last letter (I.E. '123A').
numWithLetter.message: This street number will auto increment the last letter up through the alphabet.

numForUnits.description: Confirmation that the address will auto increment the first number for a 'unit address' (I.E. '1/10').
numForUnits.message: This street number will auto increment the first number.

streetNameNotFoundError.description: Error when the street name is not found
streetNameNotFoundError.message: Could not find street with name: '$STREET_NAME$'.  Aborting auto-add.

collectDetails.description: Menu item value to collect address details for a point on the map.

collectNewDetails.description: Menu item value to collect new address details for a point on the map.
